execute_python.description: Executes a block of Python code. Parameters: `code` (string, required).

generate_image.description: Creates an image from a text prompt. Parameters: `prompt` (string, required), `width` (int, optional), `height` (int, optional), `enhance` (bool, optional), `nologo` (bool, optional).

analyze_webpage.description: Downloads and extracts clean text content from a webpage. Parameters: `url` (string, required).

generate_text.description: A general-purpose tool that generates text using an LLM. Parameters: `prompt` (string, required), `temperature` (float, optional).
